DIAS, David Anthony, M.D. Upon a motion by Dr. S. Cathey, seconded by Dr. B. Cogburn, the Board voted unanimously to issue an Emergency Order of Suspension and Notice of Hearing involving this physician. Appearance: No Reason: Board Related Date of Action: 6/20/2016 Minutes: Emergency Order of Suspension served. License suspended. Appearance: Yes Reason: Board Related Date of Action: 8/5/2016 Minutes: DIAS, David Anthony, M.D. appeared with his attorney, Sam Sexton, in response to an Emergency Order of Suspension and Notice of Hearing. Upon a motion by Dr. W. Rutledge, seconded by Dr. V. Hodges, the Board voted that there has been a violation of the Medical Practices Act, specifically, Act ยง 17-95-409 (a)( 2 )(e). As a result of the violation, the physician will receive a formal Reprimand and agrees to the following conditions: He will follow through with completing a continuing medical education course in Boundaries and pay hearing costs of $293.75 . The suspension of Dr. Dias license was lifted. Dr. W. Dudding abstained from the discussion and vote. Appearance: No Reason: Board Related Date of Action: 4/6/2017 Minutes: Discussion #16-147 . DIAS, David Anthony, M.D. Upon a motion by Dr. S. Simon, seconded by Dr. B. Cogburn, the Board voted unanimously to accept Dr. Dias proof of completion of the continuing medical education courses in Boundaries and Prescribing and requested he return to the June 2017 meeting for an update. Appearance: Yes Reason: Update Date of Action: 6/8/2017 Minutes: DIAS, David Anthony, M.D. appeared for an update. Upon a motion by Dr. O. Atiq, seconded by Dr. W.
